Text.Page:
I saw several {@LinkCreature:22#18#vampir aristocrats} wandering the halls. They weren't invited to the festival and I can't help wondering if they played a role in this disaster!

The vampirs have proven dangerous recently. Take no chances and eliminate them.

The Witches of Vadoma will owe you a great debt when this is over.

Our tradition stresses our collective strength, not reliance on outsiders.

When they're in their right minds again, perhaps we'll rethink that stance.
